  # Open the eventmanagement.properties file in the GlassfishESB-install-dir/glassfish/domains/domain-name/jbi/config directory.
  # If necessary, change the default value of the AlertTableName property and save the file.
{{{
PersistencePolicyExecInterval=600000
journalEnabled=true
PersistenceAlertCount=-1
PersistencePolicyExecEnabled=false
PersistenceAlertAge=-1
PersistenceEnabled=true
PersistenceAlertLevel=NONE
AlertTableName=NOTIFICATION_EVENT
DatabaseType=ORACLE
DBJndiName=jdbc/AlertPersistenceDB
}}}
  # Create table
    * Open the jbi_rt.jar file in the GlassfishESB-install-dir/glassfish/jbi/lib directory
    * Extract the SQL scripts (create_event_store_user.sql) for your database type from /com/sun/esb/eventmanagement/impl/scripts/
{{{
create table NOTIFICATION_EVENT (
  id NUMBER CONSTRAINT ID_PK PRIMARY KEY, 
	event_timeStamp TIMESTAMP,
  physicalHostName varchar2(256), 
	environmentName varchar2(256), 
	logicalHostName varchar2(256), 
	serverType varchar2(256), 
	serverName varchar2(256), 
	componentType varchar2(256), 
	componentProjectPathName varchar2(1024), 
	componentName varchar2(256), 
	eventType varchar2(256), 
	severity integer, 
	operationalState int, 
	messageCode varchar2(256), 
	messageDetail varchar2(4000), 
	observationalState int, 
	deploymentName varchar2(256)
);
-- INSERT statement need to use it to insure autoincrement functionality
CREATE SEQUENCE autoincrement_id; 
CREATE INDEX NOTIFICATION_EVENT_IDX ON NOTIFICATION_EVENT (EVENT_TIMESTAMP);

}}}
